text: Rettenberg is a municipality in the district of Oberallgäu in Bavaria in Germany. Rettenberg is twinned with the village La Frénaye in Northern France (close to Le Havre). Rettenberg is the southernmost village with breweries (Engelbräu and Zötlerbrauerei) in Germany. == References == Category:Oberallgäu
title: Rettenberg
